title: Head Boys Soccer Coach (no teaching assignment)
description: This Head Boys Soccer coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Dustin Drake, at dustin.drake@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.
